chunks.zh: 有多少小时候玩《问道》端游的？
chunks.en: How many people played the online game '问道' (Way of Tao) when they were young?

chunks.zh: 我是小学接触的问道，那时候一个网瘾少年的哥哥带着玩，太入迷了。
chunks.en: I was introduced to '问道' in elementary school. Back then, my older brother, a young internet addict, got me hooked, and I was totally engrossed.

chunks.zh: 后面存零花钱充个 10 元点卡就开心得不得了。
chunks.en: Later, I would save my pocket money to buy a 10 yuan game card, which made me incredibly happy.

chunks.zh: 今年春节档看完《哪吒 2 》很多道教封神演绎的神话故事就回忆起当年问道的种种。
chunks.en: After watching 'Ne Zha Reborn' during this year's Spring Festival, many Taoist myths about the Investiture of the Gods reminded me of all sorts of things about '问道' back in the day.

chunks.zh: 然后就搞了个怀旧服，有没有一起来爽一把的，纯公益 1.60 版本，开局送 20 亿元宝（相当于充 2000w 人民币）。
chunks.en: So I started a nostalgia server. Anyone want to join and have some fun? It's a purely public-service version 1.60, and you get 2 billion ingots (equivalent to 20 million RMB) at the start.

chunks.zh: 在隔壁 L 站先小范围测试了一波，目前运行一切良好。
chunks.en: I did a small-scale test on the L site next door, and everything is running smoothly so far.

chunks.zh: 但是想问下这个能在 V 站发不，如果违法规定了我就不发，不违反我就发企鹅群号在附言了。
chunks.en: But I want to ask if I can post this on V2EX. If it violates the rules, I won't. If it doesn't, I'll post the QQ group number in the postscript.

chunks.zh: 建议别公开发，我司有专人打击私服，送进去不少人了🤣。
chunks.en: I suggest not making it public. Our company has people dedicated to cracking down on private servers, and they've sent quite a few people in 🤣.

chunks.zh: 人在江湖飘哪能不挨刀，万一被我看见🙈举报了咋办
chunks.en: You can't avoid getting stabbed if you're wandering around the pugilistic world. What if I see it 🙈 and report you?

chunks.zh: 问道问道，一问就盗，三步一卡，卡的潇洒，五步一停，停的有型，卡卡停停，问道真行；记得应该是小学和初中的时候的 qq 签名
chunks.en: 问道问道 (Way of Tao, Way of Tao), ask and you're hacked. Three steps, a lag, lagging elegantly. Five steps, a pause, pausing stylishly. Lag, lag, pause, pause, '问道' is truly great; I remember it was my QQ signature in elementary and middle school.

chunks.zh: @howfree #8 泪目，我当年也搞过这个
chunks.en: @howfree #8 Tearing up, I used to do this too.

chunks.zh: 呜呜呜。那哪是游戏，那是我的青春！
chunks.en: Wuwuwu. That's not just a game, that's my youth!

chunks.zh: 有没有 v2 大佬把服务端做成 docker 版本？这样可以一键搭建，以后想玩也不用找教程了
chunks.en: Are there any V2EX experts who can make the server-side into a Docker version? This way, it can be set up with one click, and you don't need to find tutorials to play in the future.

chunks.zh: 道友好
chunks.en: Fellow Taoist!

chunks.zh: 玩过一段时间， 感觉画质没梦幻西游好 后面还是玩梦幻西游了，  我记得我当时在 龙盘泰山 区  玩的是金溪   抓了个大乌龟好像
chunks.en: I played it for a while. I felt that the graphics weren't as good as Fantasy Westward Journey, so I played Fantasy Westward Journey later. I remember I was in the Longpan Taishan district, playing as Jinxi, and I caught a big turtle, I think.

chunks.zh: @mmmao #1 道友好，一声道友一生朋友
chunks.en: @mmmao #1 Fellow Taoist, once a fellow Taoist, always a friend.

chunks.zh: @zhangfeiwudi #2 当年人手一个大乌龟，早期可培养的性价比极高的体宠，人物打伤害。
chunks.en: @zhangfeiwudi #2 Back then, everyone had a big turtle. It was a very cost-effective vitality pet in the early days, and the character dealt damage.

chunks.zh: 想起来我梦幻还有个 155DT 号，啥时候看看 cbg 上值多少钱
chunks.en: I remember I still have a level 155 DT account in Fantasy Westward Journey. I'll see how much it's worth on CBG sometime.

chunks.zh: 坐骑大葫芦怀念呀
chunks.en: Nostalgic for the gourd mount.

chunks.zh: @imherer #5 当年的好基友就是玩梦幻的，天天和他争哪个才是国产回合制之光哈哈哈。
chunks.en: @imherer #5 My good friend back then played Fantasy Westward Journey, and we argued every day about which was the light of domestic turn-based games, hahaha.

chunks.zh: BTW ，先看还是梦幻成功点，市场发展良性多了，问道从代金券开始就越来越恶心平民。
chunks.en: BTW, looking at it now, Fantasy Westward Journey is more successful. The market development is much healthier. '问道' has become increasingly disgusting to ordinary players since the coupons.

chunks.zh: 石器：都是弟弟
chunks.en: Stone Age: You're all younger brothers.

chunks.zh: @threeti #6 太极熊，问道的兰博基尼。现在 1.60 有至尊太极熊，全身黄金哈哈哈。
chunks.en: @threeti #6 Tai Chi Bear, the Lamborghini of '问道'. Now version 1.60 has the Supreme Tai Chi Bear, all golden hahaha.

chunks.zh: @jookr #9 石器是啥
chunks.en: @jookr #9 What is Stone Age?

chunks.zh: 自己也搭建一个私服满足以前的道王梦，想当年玩的是暴力土，卡 79 级
chunks.en: I also built a private server to fulfill my old Dao King dream. Back then, I played a violent Earth character and was stuck at level 79.

chunks.zh: 初中玩的时候  能秒三就觉得自己牛逼了
chunks.en: When I played in middle school, I felt awesome being able to kill three enemies in one turn.

chunks.zh: 同感！看完哪吒也想起问道，小学入坑那会满级才 125
chunks.en: Same feeling! After watching Ne Zha, I also thought of '问道'. When I first got into it in elementary school, the max level was only 125.

chunks.zh: 用技能提升首饰，最低多少级秒五？
chunks.en: What's the minimum level to kill five enemies in one turn by using skills to enhance accessories?

chunks.zh: 有搭建教程吗，也想整个。机器 配置要求多少
chunks.en: Is there a setup tutorial? I want to set one up too. What are the machine configuration requirements?
